channel.title: featured on Clarity
channel.description: Recent content in featured on Clarity

item.title: WSL中配置docker环境
item.description: 由于在wsl中无法安装docker daemon，所以无法在wsl中直接使用docker服务。但是为了体验linux的开发环境，我们可以在wsl中安装docker客户端，并通过连接window系统中的docker daemon服务来使用docker。

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
